content:
Hey all, wanted to note that there's an issue against component-model that may need some :brain: (at least it hurts my brain to try and think through the consequences) -- specifically nailing down @since() and exactly how people should move through enabling features.

https://github.com/WebAssembly/component-model/issues/382

There are some surprising little corners (and decisions to be made on what should be representable/valid WIT versus not), and intuition differs, so figured I'd make a thread to discuss, record and decide.

Clarify usage patterns for feature gates 路 Issue #382 路 WebAssembly/component-model
Hey all, after some discussion in the following PRs: bytecodealliance/wasm-tools#1689 bytecodealliance/jco#459 It seems like now would be a good time to discuss and really pin down the expected usa...
